a:editor.name: editor

a:toolbars.a:toolbar: Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough, |, Sub, Sup, |, Table, |, justifyleft, justifycenter, justifyright, justifyfull, |, Code, |, Anchor, Link, Unlink, Charmap
Cut, Copy, Paste, PasteText, |, Bullist, NumList, |, Forecolor, Backcolor, |, Search, Replace, |, Outdent, Indent
a:toolbars.a:codetoolbar: Bullist, Numlist, Listitem, Nbsp, Break, Paragraph

a:presentation.a:emotions: cool, cry, embarassed, foot-in-mouth, frown, innocent, kiss, laughing, money-mouth, sealed, smile, surprised, tongue-out, undecided, wink, yell
a:presentation.a:blockformats: normal, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, pre, address
